title: Router: Performance + capacity (neutral)
description: Routes perf/load/profiling/capacity intents to neutral packs and WAIT_USER when targets are missing.

content.mermaid:
flowchart TD
  Input[Perf request] --> Targets{have targets?}
  Targets -->|no| Q[pack.perf.ask_targets.wait_user.v1]
  Targets -->|yes| Kind{which?}
  Kind -->|baseline + gates| B[pack.perf.baseline_and_gates.neutral.v1]
  Kind -->|optimize| O[pack.perf.optimize_from_evidence.neutral.v1]
  Kind -->|capacity plan| C[pack.perf.capacity_plan.neutral.v1]
  Q --> Done[Done]
  B --> Done
  O --> Done
  C --> Done
